data.name: Arms Trade Tycoon Tanks Demo
data.detailed_description:
This is a very early version of the game and much is subject to change! This demo may not represent the final state of the game upon the release.
We have a lot of ideas, but we sincerely hope that you will join us on this journey and contribute with your feedback after playing the demo build.
data.about_the_game:
This is a very early version of the game and much is subject to change! This demo may not represent the final state of the game upon the release.

This demo may not represent the final state of the game upon the release.We have a lot of ideas, but we sincerely hope that you will join us on this journey and contribute with your feedback after playing the demo build.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2100 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 570 / Radeon HD 6970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4000 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 570 / Radeon HD 6970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS Sierra 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2100 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS Sierra 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4000 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
